title: When someone trolls your ranked game but you're already b5 0lp

replies.body: If you got nothing to lose, there's nothing to worry about.

> [{quoted}](name=JayHog1992,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kmZAdJny,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-22T14:31:42.465+0000)
>
> If you got nothing to lose, there's nothing to worry about.

That's when you troll the troller lol
{{champion:110}}
http://assets0.ordienetworks.com/images/GifGuide/clapping/riker.gif

Can you still go for the -100 LP by dodging?
{{champion:110}} _Beware a man with nothing to lose._

I don't know if they changed it, but here have a relic from the past.

https://65.media.tumblr.com/6cd31e022d37e1cda372ed9416247bb6/tumblr_occ3iaYG1H1son6f6o1_1280.png
I see dat -1337.
Yea, you can do that, i got to -200LP gold 5 on my smurf before playing on it with friends and rising it
not even pants

http://leaguecraft.com/meme/asset/meme_760px_11313.jpg?noredirect

Solo Que memories.
This is so front page worthy.
If you are playing at B5 level, I'm fairly sure they are just lying about trolling and actually suck at the game.
i thought for sure id be B5 this season... nope B3 with a worse seeding rec than last yr.... seems legit.
0 mmr here I come!
The dream
https://media3.giphy.com/media/iAHwO8yqL5xLi/giphy.gif

https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http%3A%2F%2F31.media.tumblr.com%2F089f371811aff6e9a6ea348e9cfa3bb9%2Ftumblr_mw247aL4si1s306rao1_500.gif&imgrefurl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gamefaqs.com%2Fboards%2F939946-phoenix-wright-ace-attorney-dual-destinies%2F68011409&docid=nMMTFjljlDIjhM&tbnid=iUcziEMZXMmkHM%3A&w=500&h=281&bih=971&biw=1920&ved=0ahUKEwj0_6q3tNbOAhXDQSYKHU9-DMMQMwgdKAEwAQ&iact=mrc&uact=8

> [{quoted}](name=BlazeLegacy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kmZAdJny,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-08-22T22:21:25.573+0000)
>
> I dont think alot of people in bronze are serious players. if they want to actually get out of Bronze they could try Duo queue with a higher elo like silver 2 and 1 and up. it helps... slowly. this season i got in bronze 3 but i carried myself out. 
> I dont think alot of people in bronze are serious players. if they want to actually get out of Bronze they could try Duo queue with a higher elo like silver 2 and 1 and up. it helps... slowly. this season i got in bronze 3 but i carried myself out. 
> I dont think alot of people in bronze are serious players. if they want to actually get out of Bronze they could try Duo queue with a higher elo like silver 2 and 1 and up. it helps... slowly. this season i got in bronze 3 but i carried myself out. 

Fucking triggered
"Hey you should boost, it's great!"
No elo boosting means guy boosting you log into your account and carry you to desired division
No The Silver 1 guy is definitely not the reason the Bronze 5 guy is winning out of nowhere gtfo you Booosteed Animal

So you partied with a silver 1 and then got out of bronze...
hmmmm...
maybe it's magic that he suddenly got better!
yeah and be another OTP, no thanks id rather play most champions decently than be good at very few.

You see that is exactly what is wrong with Duo Que..........you are basically supporting people that want to be carried instead of ranking on their own.

The real problem with Bronze are all of the high elo players playing on their Bronze smurf accounts. All they do is spend the whole game getting kills and never push or do anything to try to win....and then onnce it looks like their team is about to win they do all they can to make the team lose so that their accounts stay in Bronze. its happened to me 4 times since DQ release......3 of them admitted smurfs....the other game it was clear that was what happened after looking at their match history to see them getting over 20 and sometimes over 30 kills every game but losing every game.
lol
trolls ruin the fun of playing
theres good trolls and bad trolls..... good ones will joke around and try to win, bad ones get salty and feed intentionally.

> [{quoted}](name=Snaggle Tooth,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kmZAdJny,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2016-08-23T00:01:36.827+0000)
>
> theres good trolls and bad trolls..... good ones will joke around and try to win, bad ones get salty and feed intentionally.

actually the bad ones just do everything they can to make their own team lose...... had a malz jg troll last night, still tilted and furious over it right now
its sad they are even considered trolls.... can we start callin em rejects to do trundle justice?
no because trundle makes me sad
Nice meme +1
this is the funniest post i've seen in weeks. well done lol

> [{quoted}](name=Farnermus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kmZAdJny,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2016-08-23T23:21:43.696+0000)
>
> this is the funniest post i've seen in weeks. well done lol

ty <3
Doesn't your mmr still go down though? So you'd get less points for future wins?
yes, it does.
no that unless you faced a lower mmr enemy team you earn less LP if you played against an higher elo team and won you gain normally 20lp at most
You lose your time playing 4vs6. It's not about lp it's about the journey my friends.
lololol

LMAO
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
this is actually pretty good
I wouldn't mind being b5 0LP...No more stress in ranked as there's nothing to lose. Beats being low-mid plat half the time.
Welcome to my life....
Perks of being bronze v
I have memes and have never upvoted one but this one actually made me laugh. Touche sir.
